Articles.Content:
Hey, I recently bought a new laptop and ive had my eye on this game for a while, is it possible to play it on this?

Specs: https://www.amazon.com/VivoBook-i5-8250U-NanoEdge-Fingerprint-F510UA-AH51/dp/B0762S8PYM/ref=sr_1_2?s=pc&ie=UTF8&qid=1516820309&sr=1-2&keywords=asus+laptop

Thanks

Well, it will definitely run the game.

The only thing that might hold you back a bit is the fairly low clock speed of the processor, but it looks like you can OC it to 3.4 Ghz, which will be pretty good.  Not sure if it'll automatically do that, or if you'll need to tell it to.

4 hours ago, Geonovast said:

Well, it will definitely run the game.

The only thing that might hold you back a bit is the fairly low clock speed of the processor, but it looks like you can OC it to 3.4 Ghz, which will be pretty good.  Not sure if it'll automatically do that, or if you'll need to tell it to.

OK, thanks =D
